title: Symbolic therapy / Non-verbal hypnosis in the forest
description:
One of Dr. Marco Paret's non-verbal hypnosis Masterclasses this year took a place in Brazil. In this video he demonstrates the power of the nature in the a forest, where he did a symbolic therapy. The woman had a negative emotions in herself and she wanted to get rid of them. With non-verbal hypnosis this healing is completely achievable. Watch the video to see how exactly he did it. Learn all of these powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info 

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
